comments.body:
is this image only used for e2e tests? or is it also used more generally?

if it's only for tests, it seems reasonable to move here, but if it has uses outside testing I'm not sure that `test/images` is the right place for it.
I don't see it is used anywhere. I already see other 2 images `redis` and `zookeeper` already removed part of https://github.com/kubernetes/contrib/pull/2683.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@# Peer finder

This is a simple peer finder daemon that is useful with StatefulSet and related use cases.
